author: cmpilato
msg: On the 'uris-as-urls' branch, add another useful API.

author: rgass
msg: adding support to do a soft power off via acpi instead of just yanking the power.
The host must have acpid enabled or this will not do anything.
systemmanagement.py starts a thread to confirm that the power is indeed off
when a soft shutdown is executed

author: mrisaliti
msg: Internationalization of java services for manufacturing component (OFBIZ-4091)

author: veithen
msg: AXIOM-353: Use an InputSource object to pass the stream internally to OMMetaFactory. This allows to reduce the number of different methods in OMMetaFactory and enables support for character encoding and system IDs.
